price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߌߟߋ ߦߴߌ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߛߍߣߍ߲߬ ߸ ߞߟߌߟߌߟߊ ߦߋ߫ ߞߟߌߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߜߏߦߊߣߊ߲ߞߏ ߘߏ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
